banner.description: is a product designed to be instaled on allready mounted windows. The self-adhesive smart foil, allows us to transform a normal window into a tinted window with a click of a button.

desc.title: Click Tint - Smart Foil
desc.subtitle: About Click Tint
desc.desc1: Click Tint foil is a self-adhesive foil that is aplied to glass. Upon electrical aplication Click Tint foil transform itself into a
desc.desc2: Click Tint фолијата се состои од кристали кои при додавање на електричен напон се порамнуваат на една иста страна и го претвараат стаклото во провидно додека при исклучување на електричниот напон кристалите се порамнуваат така да фолијата дава мат и непровиден ефект со млечно бел боја
desc.desc3: Click Tint фолијата е достапна во ширина од 1.8м. Доколку површината која сакате да ја покриете е поголема од 1.8м тогаш се аплицираат две или повеќе фолии една до друга со меѓусебна оддалеченост од 1 милиметар.

examples.title: Say Goodbye to Wals!
examples.subtitle: Application
examples.desc: is a modern solution when it comes to privacy, aesthetics and functionality. The easy to use characteristic makes this smart film a quite popular choice in many homes, offices, healthcare facilities, conference rooms, spa centers, hotels, malls, etc.

exampleOne.title: Click-Tint for a modern home
exampleOne.desc2: Click-Tint is an ideal alternative to curtains that provides privacy when you need it, while allowing more light to let you enjoy sunny days..

exampleTwo.title: Click-Tint for you hotel
exampleTwo.desc1: Click-Tint contributes to more comfort and luxury, making your hotel stand out from the others.
exampleTwo.desc2: An ideal solution for modern, dynamic partitions between rooms..

exampleThree.title: Click-Tint for your clinic
exampleThree.desc1: Enhance the modern look of your clinic. Click-Tint smart film will add a sense of efficiency and cleanliness, along with a minimalist design that will give your clinic a more professional appearance and instill a sense of security in your patients.
exampleThree.desc2: The Click-Tint film creates an open space, allowing greater connection with patients, while simultaneously maintaining a high level of privacy with just one click.

exampleFour.title: Click-Tint for your office
exampleFour.desc1: Modernize your office by discarding cumbersome partitions and unwanted walls.
exampleFour.desc2: With Click-Tint, achieve a guaranteed improved and more modern work environment, enhanced focus, and reduced distractions with just one click.
